analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0x3123ff80cbdfd35577628a41ff50598cefc2d236.sol:
	Contract Token has payable functions:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0x3123ff80cbdfd35577628a41ff50598cefc2d236.sol#82) is not in mixedCase
